item.title: X updates its terms, files countersuit to lay claim to the ‘Twitter’ trademark after newcomer’s challenge
item.description: X's new terms of service say that no one can use the Twitter name, trademarks, logos and more without written consent.

item.title: Study shows Instacart may be charging some shoppers 20% more for the same product
item.description: The delivery app has claimed that price testing is part of a longstanding practice in retail sales.

item.title: Slate crosses 150,000 reservations despite waning EV truck enthusiasm
item.description: It took Slate Auto about seven months to grow its customer list by 50%, but new reservations appear to be outpacing any cancelations.

item.title: DoorDash rolls out Zesty, an AI social app for discovering new restaurants
item.description: Users can view and share photos and comments about restaurants they’ve visited, discover content from others, and follow people just like on any socia...

item.title: Meta’s AI glasses can now help you hear conversations better
item.description: Conversation focus uses the AI glasses' open-ear speakers to amplify the voice of the person you're talking to, says Meta.
